meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>location</kanji> in the <kanji>city</kanji> where the <kanji>stock</kanji>s <kanji>ritual</kanji> takes place is the <vocabulary>stock market</vocabulary>. Just think of what happens in a stock market... the stock ritual, where people buy and sell stocks. And, of course, this is located in the city.
readingMnemonic: The readings are all readings that you learned with the kanji, so as long as you remember them, you’re good to go!
